subsection.name: Description
subsection.div:
Restricts using
Unicode escapes (such as \u221e). It is possible to allow using escapes for
non-printable, control characters. Also, this check can be configured to allow using escapes if trail comment is present. By the option it is possible to allow using escapes if literal contains only them.

tr.td: Allow use escapes if trail comment is present.
Allow use escapes for non-printable, control characters.
Allow if all characters in literal are escaped.
Allow use escapes for non-printable, whitespace characters.
